sub_title: TOGAF ® 9 EA | Cloud | Digital | OSS/BSS Professional
summary:
Above 20 years of leadership experience across every phase of E2E Enterprise Solution Architecture Development life-cycle across Business, Data, Application and Technology domains – with Cross-Domain-Functional knowledge across Digital, Systems & Network OSS Transformation Programmes for Global Operators across UK and Europe and passion for Cloud computing technologies

Business Analysis & Consulting: Expertise in Business Case preparation, Vendor Evaluation, Product Management, PoC, Feasibility Studies, RIA, Gap Analysis, Business Process Modeling, System Rationalization, Requirements Engineering & Requirements Management

Certifications:

1. TOGAF 9 Certified Enterprise Architect
2. AWS Certified Solutions Architect (Associate)
3. Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Foundations 2020 Certified (Associate)
4. Microsoft Certified Azure Fundamentals
5. IBM Cloud Private Infrastructure & Architecture Foundations Certified
6. Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals (Online certified)
7. Scrum Alliance Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
8. Scaled Agile Certified SAFe 4.5 Agilist
9. Automation Anywhere Certified Advanced RPA Professional
10. 'ITIL v3 Foundation Certificate in ITSM'
11. IBM Certified Solution Designer, RUP v7.0
12. Certifications on IoT, AI/ML, Data Science by IBM Cognitve

Specialties: 
1. Domain knowledge in Identity Access Management, Online Sales, E-Commerce, Omni Channel, Product Catalogue and Business Rules Management and Web Analytics
2. Specialize in Solutions Consulting in OSS/BSS across FAB for Telcos in their VoIP domain
3. Providing consultancy and support to Telco on E2E System Integration implementation for VoIP Service Introduction and Infrastructure Deployment
4. Expertise in VoIP Service domain and Architecture elements. Worked with key OEM vendors like Ericsson, Alcatel Lucent, Cisco, Sonus, Nortel Genband, Acme Packet
5. Worked with multiple COTS vendors - Oracle, Amdocs, Siebel, IBM, EMC

profile_positions.description:

Project(s) Domain: Cloud and Network Edge

b.	Lead across Service Fulfillment & Assurance Domains – supporting High Level Designs, Component design review and sign-off
a.	Work in close coordination with Product Management to review Business requirements & Business Case preparation
b.	Support Process and Service Design teams to achieve collaboration with Technical, Business and Operational stakeholders to secure ORT sign-off

profile_positions.title: Associate Director - Technology

profile_positions.description:
Change Advisory Lead:
Lead and manage the Architecture Change Management Operations for Video Back Office Architecture and Service delivery Platforms & DevOps across STB's, Infrastructure (VMWare), Network (Cisco ACI/AWS Cloud), Video Applications (Linear, VoD, Recording) and Microservices/Kubernetes to support Major Release/Upgrades across LG Affiliates
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
Worked across multiple Digital Transformation Programmes for Online Sales, Digital Commerce, CSR Care Portal & Identity Access Management for various country affiliates of Liberty Global in Europe

a.	Delivery Lead/Scrum Master – responsible for scope and delivery of Identity Access Management solution for multiple digital transformation programmes (Care, Sales, Sites, Mobile Apps) across major LG country affiliates
b.	E2E Cross-functional technical lead for Digital transformation (E-Commerce) programme and drive implementation across architecture (AEM, Product Catalogue, Ecommerce Engine, Business Rules, Identity Management, Integration Layer, CRM)
c.	Evaluate solutions from e-Commerce Vendor (Elastic Path) across e2e customer journeys (Discovery, Shopping Cart, Check-out, Order submit) and align with UX Design 
d.	Advisory to Business stakeholders around Product configuration and business rules definition 
e.	Define and prioritize product requirements for Business
f.	Lead the e2e design and solution delivery for Online CSR Portal
g.	E2E Solution responsibility to lead the assessment & design of complex business requirements and driving the technical discussions with other domain architects and in coordination with architectural stakeholders and business 
h.	Provide technical thought leadership and actively participate during solution design phase and liaise with Architect on any gaps during solution implementation 
i.	Lead Design authority for Personalized Sales application for UPC (NL, IE & PL) – and responsible for PRD
j.	As UAT Triage Lead & “Trusted Advisory” for UAT teams
k.	Manage business stakeholders & work closely with Product Managers, Architects, UX Design, DevOps for driving the Business requirements throughout the E2E life-cycle
l.	Lead the Development, Release & Deployment activities for Business and coordinate with Technical, Test & Support teams for various Country affiliates across multiple Releases till go-live

BRD

profile_positions.title: Business Consultant/ Senior Analyst

profile_positions.description:
System Integration Lead for Global VoIP Infrastructure & Network Transformation for British Telecom

1. Leadership role responsible for driving the E2E Solution across multiple OSS & Cross-Functional Domain and involved in E2E Lifecycle from Requirements Management to Deployment
2. Influence Invitation To Tender (ITT) on the Vendor assessment and conduct Impact analysis on their System Integration capabilities across all domains – FCAPS
3. Establish OSS Roadmap and Maturity levels and provide consulting across various functional domain aligned with Business priorities, Operational challenges, key stakeholder requirements & Vendor commitments – for Day 1 (UK) and Day 2 (Global) Infrastructure deployment and rollout
4. Design Authority responsible for Quality assurance of OSS designs delivered by Components
5. Lead on Vendor engagement sessions in driving Requirements on various OSS domains

Technology domain: Carrier Grade VoIP Infrastructure (SBC, MGW, BGW, CRE, MGC)
Service domain: IP eXchange, SIP-Trunking, Fibre Voice Access, Hosted VoIP
OEM vendor: Genband, Alcatel Lucent, Acme Packet, Net Number, Cisco
OSS Domains: Network Plan & Build, Inventory, T&D, Performance, Surveillance, RTTM, Capacity Management, Mediation
profile_positions.title: Lead System Integration & E2E Solution Architect

profile_positions.description:
Client: British Telecom, UK

Solution Design lead/Architect for Service Fullfillment and Assurance domains

As Lead Designer and O/BSS Architect for Metro Ethernet products (E-Line, E-LAN, E-Tree) - responsible for designing complex solutions across Order Management, Service Orchestration & Service Design & Logical Inventory and Billing
As SPOC for all OSS Design issues/escalations pertaining to implementation/ system integration and resolutions of PR

Technology domain: Metro Ethernet Backhaul Services - over Copper, Fibre & DWDM
profile_positions.title: E2E Solution Designer

profile_positions.description:
Client: British Telecom, UK

Business Initiative Lead for Service Introduction of VoIP Interconnect Service across Fulfillment, Assurance & Billing (FAB)

1. As Front-door Lead - reviewing, scoping & prioritizing various Business requirements targeting a phased Delivery Plan required for the Service Launch & align with the Agile methodology
2. As Lead Business Analyst – working with stakeholders to analyze, assess and evaluate CE requirements for OSS/BSS & impact assessment across multiple domains – L2C, T2R, Billing, Plan/Build, RTTM/KPI
3. As E2E OSS Design Lead across multiple Application domain – Order Management, Service Fulfilment & Workflow, Service Design & Assign, Inventory Management, Billing & Payments, Plan & Build, Domain Management, Problem Management, Surveillance, Network Performance, T&D – engaging and working in close relations with Enterprise/ Platform Architects
4. As Design authority on all OSS/BSS deliverables, accountable for sign-off on all Platform LLD’s, IVVT Test Cases
5. Defining OSS/BSS strategy for Day 1 (manual solution) and Day 2 (OSS automation)

Technology Domain: Fixed-line (PSTN), NGN Carrier Grade VoIP Interconnect based on TISPAN, VoIP Protocols (H.243, SS7/SIGTRAN, MGCP, SIP/SIP-I over SCTP)
OEM/Network Domain: Cisco MGW, Ericsson Telephony Softswitch Solution (TSS), Siemens SGW, Cisco SFW, A-Lu Border Gateway, Net Number Routing Proxy/ ENUM
OSS Domains: Fullfilment & Assurance across Customer/ Service/ Resource Management domain and Interconnect Billing

profile_positions.description:

•	Identify software testing services (functional, performance engineering & QA) opportunities in Mobile applications space (ISV’s, Telcos, etc)
•	Handling prospects/clients in Telecom domain – Operators (Cingular Wireless, DTAC, Excelcom, Sprint), OSS/BSS vendors (Amdocs), Mobile Application developers, Mobile Infrastructure vendors (Lucent, Samsung, Nokia) and IT Outsourcing companies (Sun Microsystems APAC, Logica CMG, Fujitsu)

profile_positions.title: Business Development Executive

profile_positions.description:
Role Summary:

o	Handling on an average 7-8 clients a day and coordinating with 4 to 5 cross-functional teams during presales, delivery and support phase
o	Preparing technical proposals and presentations for Tender submissions and working closely with Sales team during pre-sales phase for deal closure
o	Preparing Project implementation plan for Product delivery and monitoring and tracking the same to meet project deadlines 
o	Managing on an average 4-5 projects a month which includes handling client’s Change request management and Service delivery
o	Managing relationships with Vendors and Business partners

Key responsibilities across Product Life-cycle Management :

(1) Pre-Sales:
o	to analyze client requirements and assist sales team in architecting solutions                 (Messaging solutions, Portals & Intranet solutions, Work flow and collaboration solutions)
o	to prepare Presentations, Business Case Studies, Whitepapers, Competitive Documents, Product Information Document, etc

(2) Product Development
o	to coordinate with Development team in driving product enhancements and customization and meet customer requirements
o	to identify feature gaps with respect to competitors’ products and bring in new product features - drive Product development with respect to roadmaps

(3) Product Delivery
o	Responsible for Inventory Planning and managing Logistics during Product Delivery
o	to coordinate with various teams to ensure Service Delivery happens as per processing time and minimize any order-to-delivery delay to ensure quality in Service Delivery

(4) Post Implementation support
o	to ensure timely resolution of customer issues/problems and coordinating with Front end team (Customer Care) and Back end team (Technical Support and Mail Administration) and with Client during escalations
o define and implement Process flow for Post Sales support requests
